item.title: Retail Power Panel
item.description: The industry's leading retail giants discuss the recent holiday shopping season, the hottest selling technologies and what they expect in the coming year.

item.description: A topical discussion of the regulatory hurdles and opportunities faced by the industry.

item.title: Personal Healthcare Technologies: Empowering Consumers with Home Health Solutions
item.description: As the boomer generation ages and obesity rates climb, international healthcare faces a growing crisis.
item.itunes:author: Lois Burns

item.title: Entertainment Technology: View from Hollywood
item.description: Today's multimedia distribution models have tremendous impact on Hollywood. Many are embracing these new technologies and services while others are shunning them.
item.itunes:author: Chris Marlowe

item.title: Yahoo! Keynote Featuring Terry Semel
item.description: Listen to Terry Semel discuss the future vision of Yahoo!
